waas-policy
***********


Description
===========

The details of a Web Application Acceleration and Security (WAAS)
policy. A policy describes how the WAAS service should operate for the
configured web application.

**Warning:** Oracle recommends that you avoid using any confidential
information when you supply string values using the API.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* custom-protection-rule

  * list

* delete

* get

* list

* update
